description: The file defines a Flutter widget for the home screen of a note-taking app, managing note display, search, and layout toggle between grid and list views. It interacts with a provider for state management and navigates to note editing and viewing screens.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Main widget representing the home screen with app bar, search, notes list/grid, and floating action button.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the logic of HomeScreen including search controller, navigation, and layout state.

classes.name: _NotesList
classes.description: Stateless widget displaying notes in a list view, with actions for opening, editing, toggling pinned state, and deleting notes.

classes.name: _NotesGrid
classes.description: Stateless widget displaying notes in a grid view, with similar interactions as _NotesList.

methods.name: _openCreateNote
methods.description: Navigates to the note editor screen for creating a new note.

methods.name: _openView
methods.description: Navigates to the note view screen to display a specific note.

methods.name: _openEdit
methods.description: Navigates to the note editor screen for editing a specific note.
